project_abstract.cdata: The Rural Transport Project will provide for construction and improvement of rural roads to support agricultural and agro-industrial developments; to strengthen road maintenance in the Sarawak Public Works Department; and to assist the Federal and the two State Governments in their efforts to improve transport planning and staff training. The project consists of: (a) road improvements in Sabah comprising construction and upgrading of 192 km rural trunk roads and of about 100 km agricultural access roads; (b) staff training in the Sabah and Sarawak Public Works Departments; (c) strengthening the Sarawak PWD road maintenance organization; (d) a road transport review in Sabah and Sarawak and road studies in Sarawak; and (e) a national ports study covering the whole of Malaysia.
